items.defaultValue: This simple Pebble app allows you to send a voice-dictated command to an endpoint of your choosing. This app then accepts a single string response from your endpoint, displaying the string as a message. You can treat it like your own assistant. You send the commands to your endpoint and handle them there. Then, ensure your endpoint send a human readable response (which will be displayed on your Pebble). For more information on how this works, see (resource url).
